response.answer_text: The trick is to know what stage you are in and to be not stuck in the past. You are single vs. you are married vs. you are a dad vs. you are a granddad. Poof! Meeting Miss Right at a bar was the goal, later it was being a great father. Let go of one joy to get a new one. You do not stop doing fun things when you get old; you get old when you stop doing fun things.

Heavens no, 13 is still really just getting started in life! You still have high school ahead of you, and college. Enjoy every day, don't forget to breathe and live each day to its fullest.. good luck to you!
